text: The Lithuania women's national under-16 and under-17 is a national basketball team of Lithuania and is governed by the Lithuanian Basketball Federation. It represents Lithuania in international under-16 and under-17 (under age 17 and under age 16) women's basketball competitions. ==See also== * Lithuania women's national basketball team * Lithuania men's national under-19 basketball team ==References== U17 Category:Women's national under-17 basketball teams
title: Lithuania women's national under-17 basketball team
